title: Kill No More VS ½ Prince - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Gender Bender   Sci-fi   Shoujo   Slice of Life
author: Yu Wo   御我
description: Liola and Kaiser from Kill No More meet Xiao Lan and the rest of the 1/2 Prince crew. Set early in Kill No More and after the series has already concluded for 1/2 Prince. Kill No More VS 1/2 Prince is a short story written by Yu Wo that crosses two of her series, Kill No More and 1/2 Prince.>
